title: What are some philosophical questions that a heroin addict would ask himself? - Quora

response.answer_text: An actively using heroin addict? Philosophical questions don’t enter the equation. There are only 2 statements: Where can I steal/beg/trade/whore enough money for my next fix?Being high is the greatest thing ever, if I were just a little more high, that would be the greatest.Stand back, those of you administering narcan. Sure, you may have saved the person’s life, but s/he’s not going to thank you for wrecking his/her high. More than 1 nurse I’ve known has gotten punched in the face for wrecking someone’s good time, although they had no pulse.
